name: Volume-Confirmed Engulfing Intraday
description: Multi-asset (US large-cap stocks & major FX crosses) intraday strategy that trades 15-minute bullish/bearish engulfing candles validated by a 20-period volume filter. Risk is capped at 2 % of account equity per trade via fixed-fraction sizing, exits use a 1.5 % trailing/absolute stop and 3 % target, with a hard 10-bar time-out (handled inside the execution engine). Designed to avoid overnight exposure.
